divs: Sighting Details Sirs, i was walking back from the store at theloop area near downtownand, i noticed what i thought was i bag caught in thewind. i saidto my self thats not right thats prety big for somthing like that inoticed i got light headed as the object flew topsy turvy upthe eslava creek tothe Harold Johnson police Headquarters onhiway 90. the object was triangular andmoved quickly and thendisapered, it was just gone like turning out a light.
Summary: dark triangular object flying north over Mobile, A
trends: There have been no other sightings in Littleville
This sighting has never been favorited.
